languages.text: "Кто знает. Их нашли в клетушках ихних, уже дохлыми. На телах были язвы синюшные, и пахло скверно, так что нашедшие, с их слов, даже обокрасть трупы не решились. Это они, конечно, молодцы. Выпустить мы их, конечно, все равно не выпустили".

"Who knows? They found them in their hovels, already dead. Blue sores on their bodies, and they stank something awful, which is why the lot that found them didn't even risk looting the corpses. Good on them, I guess. Doesn't mean we let them out, of course."
languages.original_text: "Кто знает. Их нашли в клетушках ихних, уже дохлыми. На телах были язвы синюшные, и пахло скверно, так что нашедшие, с их слов, даже обокрасть трупы не решились. Это они, конечно, молодцы. Выпустить мы их, конечно, все равно не выпустили".

traits.locale_text: "Who knows? They found them in their holes, already dead. Blue sores on their bodies, and they smelled real bad, which is why the lot that found them didn't even risk looting the corpses. Good on them, I guess. Doesn't mean we let them out, of course."

"Who knows? They found them in their holes, already dead. Blue sores on their bodies, and they smelled real bad, which is why the lot that found them didn't even risk looting the corpses. Good on them, I guess. Doesn't mean we let them out, of course."

"Who knows? They found them in their hovels, already dead. Blue sores on their bodies, and they stank something awful, which is why the lot that found them didn't even risk looting the corpses. Good on them, I guess. Doesn't mean we let them out, of course."

"Who knows? They found them in their hovels, already dead. Blue sores on their bodies, and they stank something awful, which is why the lot that found them didn't even risk looting the corpses. Good on them, I guess. Doesn't mean we let them out, of course."

languages.text: “谁知道呢？有人在他们的小屋里发现他们的时候，他们人已经死了。尸体上长着蓝色的疮疤，而且味道很冲。那些发现尸体的人甚至都不敢去搜刮尸体，我猜这就是原因吧。幸亏他们没这么干，我猜。不过当然了，这并不意味着我们会把那些人放出来。”
languages.original_text: "Who knows? They found them in their hovels, already dead. Blue sores on their bodies, and they stank something awful, which is why the lot that found them didn't even risk looting the corpses. Good on them, I guess. Doesn't mean we let them out, of course."

traits.locale_text: “谁知道呢？有人在他们的小屋里发现他们的时候，他们人已经死了。尸体上长着蓝色的疮疤，而且味道很冲。那些发现尸体的人甚至都不敢去搜刮尸体，我猜这就是原因吧。幸亏他们没这么干，我猜。不过当然了，这并不意味着我们会把那些人放出来。”

languages.text: «A saber. Los encontraron en sus chabolas, muertos ya. Los cadáveres estaban llenos de llagas azules y apestaban, así que los que los encontraron no se arriesgaron a saquearlos. Bien por ellos, supongo. Aunque tampoco significa que les dejáramos salir».
languages.original_text: "Who knows? They found them in their hovels, already dead. Blue sores on their bodies, and they stank something awful, which is why the lot that found them didn't even risk looting the corpses. Good on them, I guess. Doesn't mean we let them out, of course."

traits.locale_text: «A saber. Los encontraron en sus chabolas, muertos ya. Los cadáveres estaban llenos de llagas azules y apestaban, así que los que los encontraron no se arriesgaron a saquearlos. Bien por ellos, supongo. Aunque tampoco significa que les dejáramos salir».

languages.text: 「どうでしょう？被害者がボロ屋で発見されたときは、もう亡くなっていました。体は青アザがあって悪臭もひどかったので、誰も危険を冒してまで死体を漁らなかったんですよ。そこは褒めてもいいですね。もちろん、だからって見逃すわけじゃありません」
languages.original_text: "Who knows? They found them in their hovels, already dead. Blue sores on their bodies, and they stank something awful, which is why the lot that found them didn't even risk looting the corpses. Good on them, I guess. Doesn't mean we let them out, of course."

traits.locale_text: 「どうでしょう？被害者がボロ屋で発見されたときは、もう亡くなっていました。体は青アザがあって悪臭もひどかったので、誰も危険を冒してまで死体を漁らなかったんですよ。そこは褒めてもいいですね。もちろん、だからって見逃すわけじゃありません」

languages.text: "Keine Ahnung. Sie wurden in ihren Behausungen gefunden und waren bereits tot. Blaue Geschwüre am ganzen Körper und ein übler Gestank. Deswegen haben die Leute, die sie gefunden haben, es auch nicht mal riskiert, die Leichen zu filzen. Gute Idee, denke ich. Wir haben sie natürlich trotzdem nicht rausgelassen."
languages.original_text: "Who knows? They found them in their hovels, already dead. Blue sores on their bodies, and they stank something awful, which is why the lot that found them didn't even risk looting the corpses. Good on them, I guess. Doesn't mean we let them out, of course."

traits.locale_text: "Keine Ahnung. Sie wurden in ihren Behausungen gefunden und waren bereits tot. Blaue Geschwüre am ganzen Körper und ein übler Gestank. Deswegen haben die Leute, die sie gefunden haben, es auch nicht mal riskiert, die Leichen zu filzen. Gute Idee, denke ich. Wir haben sie natürlich trotzdem nicht rausgelassen."

languages.text: « Qui sait ? On les a retrouvés dans leurs taudis, y avait plus rien à faire. Des plaies bleues sur tout le corps, et puis une odeur infâme, ce qui explique pourquoi les gens qui sont tombés dessus ont même pas pris la peine de leur faire les poches. J'imagine qu'ils ont bien fait. Même si ça veut pas dire qu'on les a laissé sortir pour autant. »
languages.original_text: "Who knows? They found them in their hovels, already dead. Blue sores on their bodies, and they stank something awful, which is why the lot that found them didn't even risk looting the corpses. Good on them, I guess. Doesn't mean we let them out, of course."

traits.locale_text: « Qui sait ? On les a retrouvés dans leurs taudis, y avait plus rien à faire. Des plaies bleues sur tout le corps, et puis une odeur infâme, ce qui explique pourquoi les gens qui sont tombés dessus ont même pas pris la peine de leur faire les poches. J'imagine qu'ils ont bien fait. Même si ça veut pas dire qu'on les a laissé sortir pour autant. »

languages.text: "Kim bilir? Barakalarında bulduklarında çoktan ölmüşler. Vücutlarında mavi yaralar varmış ve berbat kokuyorlarmış. Onları bulanlar, bu yüzden cesetleri yağmalama riskine bile girmemiş. İyi de etmişler. Elbette bu, bölgeden çıkmalarına izin vereceğimiz anlamına gelmiyor."
languages.original_text: "Who knows? They found them in their hovels, already dead. Blue sores on their bodies, and they stank something awful, which is why the lot that found them didn't even risk looting the corpses. Good on them, I guess. Doesn't mean we let them out, of course."

traits.locale_text: "Kim bilir? Barakalarında bulduklarında çoktan ölmüşlerdi. Vücutlarında mavi yaralar vardı ve korkunç kokuyorlardı. Bu yüzden onları bulan ekip cesetleri yağmalamayı göze dahi almadı. İyi de etmişler. Çıkmalarına izin vereceğiz demek değil tabii."
